title: Citizenship certificates and naturalization documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, country of origin, naturalization date, certificate number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Citizenship status (verified). Link to government authority system (passport offices and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake citizenship certificates. Domain binding verifies government authority. Passport application requirement. Permanent legal status. Prevents citizenship fraud. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
